con:request.name: AddCardToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:AddCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerCode>${DataSource - Cards#ClientId}</acr2:CustomerCode>\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${DataSource - Cards#ClientId}@${DataSource - Cards#ClientId}.zzz</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId>\r <acr2:Signature>${CustomerSignature}</acr2:Signature>\r <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardExpirationDate>${DataSource - Cards#CardExpDate}</acr2:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr2:CardNumber>${DataSource - Cards#CardNumber}</acr2:CardNumber>\r <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardVerificationNumber>${DataSource - Cards#CardCVV}</acr2:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:MagneticData xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:NameOnCard>${DataSource - Cards#NameOnCard}</acr2:NameOnCard>\r <acr2:TaxExempt>false</acr2:TaxExempt>\r </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:AddCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
